title: LF Dia supp for duo w/ coms
body:
D4 adc looking for a competent support main with an aggressive play style and a mic for coms. 

hmu

replies.body:
Yo, i'm a D4 support main.

I play a mix of aggressive and passive supports. 

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=star

I'm not on as much as i want to be, but hmu and we could perhaps play sometime.
